section.20: The Book of Qiyam Al-Lail (The Night Prayer) and Voluntary Prayers During the Day

hadiths.text: Mansur reported from Al-Hakam, from Miqsam, from Ibn 'Abbas that Umm Salamah said:"The Messenger of Allah (ï·º) used to pray witr with seven or five (rak'ahs), not separating between them with the taslim
